page.title: 17LIFE ON A CHIPSTABLE FARM
page.content:
I am Rachel, I live at Marshes Farm, Chipstable, and I am 11 years old. I am going to tell you about a normal day in my life.
In the morning, I get up at 7.30am on a school morning. I get ready, and then catch the coach at the bottom of the farm lane at about 8.30am. I come home at about 4.00pm, get changed, and have something to eat.
Then I go outside and take my pony for a ride along the country lanes. I usually ride for about three quarters of an hour. Then I groom the pony, and my first pony, and muck them both out. Then I put them in the field for the night. If there has not been any rain, I water my garden and then take Zola, my dog, for a walk.
